attributes.action: support the families who are suffering because of the closure of Farepak
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We support the families who are now having to suffer because of closure of farepak. We ask that the government investigate how this happened and if any corruption took place.We also ask that Members f Parliament from all parties give 1 day or mores pay for the families hit by the closure of Farepak
